title: So, wait, they're nerfing Udyr's late game?
body:
On PBE right now:

> Udyr
> Turtle Stance (W) shield value lowered to 60/95/130/165/200 from 60/100/140/180/220
> Phoenix Stance (R) proc damage lowered to 40/75/110/145/180 from 40/80/120/160/200

I'm pretty sure his *early game* is the issue, Riot. Nerfing the late game of an all melee champion is just stupid, and won't even fix the problem people are having in the first place, unless you just want people to stop picking him altogether.

I'm fully aware this isn't a major nerf, but they're still nerfing the wrong area, IMO.
